this_title: Art+Soul: A Personal Journey Into the World of Aboriginal Art
introduction: Hetti Perkins presents art + soul, a powerful and emotionally engaging television series about contemporary Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander art, and the artists who create it. An Eastern Arrernte and Kalkadoon desert woman, Hetti is senior curator of Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander art at the Art Gallery of New South Wales, daughter of political activist Charles Perkins and sister of filmmaker Rachel Perkins.
chinese_title: Art+Soul: A Personal Journey Into the World of Aboriginal Art
